parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Radio and Chat

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Gets provided player's Voice over Network (VoN) volume.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[getPlayerVoNVolume]] unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - the other player's unit

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Number]] in range 0..1, -1 in case of error (e.g provided a non-human)

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _volume = [[getPlayerVoNVolume]] ([[units]] [[player]] [[select]] 1);</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setPlayerVoNVolume]] [[soundVolume]] [[radioVolume]] [[musicVolume]]
</value></part></template></root>
